28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Use this black seed. For indeed it contains a cure for every disease except As-Sam" And As-Sam is death

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْحَبَّةِ السَّوْدَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Black Seed
